channel.title: Lil BUB's Big SHOW (HD MP4 - 30fps)
channel.description: Welcome to Lil BUB's Big SHOW! Lil BUB has stolen the internet's heart and now she is taking over late night. Who needs Conan or Kimmel when you can have BUB? Tune in every Tuesday to see new episodes of Lil BUB's Big Show and cute shorts of the world's most internet famous cat.
channel.itunes:summary: Lil BUB, whose unusual look and sheer "aww" factor has spawned an army of loyal fans, now has her very own weekly show. Lil BUB will host a talk show interviewing celebrity guests in addition to starring in a variety of super cute videos of BUB enjoying the good life.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Lil BUB, whose unusual look and sheer "aww" factor has spawned an army of loyal fans, now has her very own weekly show. Lil BUB will host a talk show interviewing celebrity guests in addition to starring in a variety of super cute videos of BUB enjoying

item.title: HOW to BATHE a BUB - Lil BUB's Big SHOW
item.description: Between all the food she gets all over her face, neck and chest, and the fact that she often stumbles into her own turds, it is crucial that you bathe your BUB at least once a month, or else she starts to get really ripe. By ripe I mean SUPER STINKY. No, she doesn't love it (they don't have water on her planet). But I think deep inside she appreciates it. GOOD JOB BUB.
item.content:encoded: Between all the food she gets all over her face, neck and chest, and the fact that she often stumbles into her own turds, it is crucial that you bathe your BUB at least once a month, or else she starts to get really ripe. item.title: The Return of BUB's REAL Brother: The Spooky Saga Continues - Lil BUB's Big SHOW
item.description: When BUB and Spooky first met, he was half her size. Shortly thereafter they moved in together, and Spooky grew exponentially in size, spirit and heart. Now three times her size, Spooky sometimes spooks her out. BUB may be a drama queen, but she's also the queen of drama, and this might be her very best performance yet. GOOD JOB BUB. GOOD JOB SPOOKY.

item.title: This entire time, there were actually TWO BUBS. - Lil BUB's Big SHOW
item.description: This is one of the hardest secrets I've ever had to keep. But when that first photo of BUB went viral two years ago, it was hard enough for people to believe that just one BUB was real, let alone two identical BUBs. But as you can see from this video, there are in fact two BUBs. Well technically one is BUB and the other is BOZZ, and he is her brother. And no, you can't have either of them.
item.content:encoded: This is one of the hardest secrets I've ever had to keep. item.title: Lil BUB's Big SHOW Episode 9 featuring ANDREW W.K. - Lil BUB's Big SHOW
item.description:
After more than two months, BUB is back with a brand new episode of Lil BUB's Big SHOW, and it's her best episode yet.
BUB interviews her super-pal Andrew W.K. and then challenges him to a game of magical hide and go seek. You can probably guess who wins.
GOOD JOB BUB
item.content:encoded:
